languages.text: "Тщетно. Однажды узревшие правду уже от нее не откажутся".
"You are wasting your breath. None will renounce the truth once it has been revealed to them."
languages.original_text: "Тщетно. Однажды узревшие правду уже от нее не откажутся".

traits.locale_text: "You are wasting your breath. None will renounce the truth once it has been revealed to them."

languages.text: «Está malgastando el aliento. Nadie renuncia a la verdad una vez la conoce».
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your breath. None will renounce the truth once it has been revealed to them."

traits.locale_text: «Está malgastando el aliento. Nadie renuncia a la verdad una vez la conoce».

languages.text: “你这是在白费口舌。所有人都看到了真理，没有人会背弃信仰。”
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your breath. None will renounce the truth once it has been revealed to them."

traits.locale_text: “你这是在白费口舌。所有人都看到了真理，没有人会背弃信仰。”

languages.text: 「言っても無駄だ。真実が明らかになってしまったら、誰もそれを放棄しない」
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your breath. None will renounce the truth once it has been revealed to them."

traits.locale_text: 「言っても無駄だ。真実が明らかになってしまったら、誰もそれを放棄しない」

languages.text: « Inutile de gaspiller votre salive. Personne ici ne reniera la vérité qui lui a été révélée. »
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your breath. None will renounce the truth once it has been revealed to them."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de gaspiller votre salive. Personne ici ne reniera la vérité qui lui a été révélée. »

languages.text: "Nefesini boşa tüketiyorsun. Gerçek bir kez ifşa olduktan sonra kimse ondan şaşmaz."
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your breath. None will renounce the truth once it has been revealed to them."

traits.locale_text: "Nefesini boşa tüketiyorsun. Gerçek bir kez ifşa olduktan sonra kimse ondan şaşmaz."

languages.text: "Ihr vergeudet meine Zeit. Niemand schwört der Wahrheit ab, nachdem sie ihm offenbart wurde."
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your breath. None will renounce the truth once it has been revealed to them."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr vergeudet meine Zeit. Niemand schwört der Wahrheit ab, nachdem sie ihm offenbart wurde."
